REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0623 reute r f BC-BUSINESSLAND-<BUSL>-C 03-11 0079

TEXT.TITLE: BUSINESSLAND <BUSL> COMPLETES OFFERING
TEXT.BODY: Businessland Inc said it sold 50 mln dlrs of 5-1/2 pct convertible subordinated debentures due 2007 in a registered public offering. The company said each debenture is convertible into shares of Businessland common stock at a conversion price of 20.50 dlrs. Net proceeds will be used to repay amounts outstanding under the company's bank credit line and for working capital, the company also said. Reuter
